commit.message: Initial changes to generate aggregate javadocs
Build only required modules for aggregate reports

nodes.bodyText: Is this a configuration for the Javadoc plugin or a report configuration? I don't see an option for aggregate in the Javadoc plugin documentation

Suggested change

+      <distributionManagement>
+        <snapshotRepository>
+          <id>ossrh</id>
+          <name>Sonatype Snapshots</name>

+          <uniqueVersion>true</uniqueVersion>
+          <layout>default</layout>

+        <site>

+          <url>${site.url}/site/</url>
+        </site>
+      </distributionManagement>
+
+      <build>

+              <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+              <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
+              <version>3.1.1</version> <!-- {x-version-update;org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-javadoc-plugin;external_dependency} -->
+              <configuration>

+                <doctitle>Azure SDK for Java Reference Documentation</doctitle>
